segments.text: Welcome to Flower Power , sir . What can I get for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like a dozen long-stemmed roses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I'd like them sent to this address .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to sign the card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , could you just write your secret admirer on it for me ? I don't want her to recognize my handwriting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah ... very well , sir . I'll have them delivered this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1
